alert.note: Alert for Butte; Northern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 6:04PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Butte and north central Meade Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 604 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles south of Dears Ears Butte, or 35 miles northeast of Belle Fourche, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fairpoint. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
